sentences.en: "You're an obstinate man," she said. "Is that a criticism," I said, "or just an observation?".
sentences.cn: “你是个很执拗的人，”她说道。“你这是批评呢，”我说，“还是只是发表评论而已？”

sentences.en: Art classes help develop children’s powers of observation.
sentences.cn: 美术课有助于提高儿童的观察力。

sentences.en: Careful observation suggests that this is not the case.
sentences.cn: 仔细观察的结果表明情况并非如此。

sentences.en: Darwin’s observations on the habits of certain birds
sentences.cn: 达尔文对某些鸟类习性的论述

sentences.en: Detailed observations were carried out on the behaviour of the students.
sentences.cn: 对这些学生的行为作了细致观察。

sentences.en: Empirical observation says that it is rarely a problem for users.
sentences.cn: 但经验显示,这对用户来说通常不是问题.

sentences.en: From the observation booth, we watched Ted and his therapist through the one-way glass.
sentences.cn: 我们在观察室透过单向玻璃注视着特德和他的治疗师。

sentences.en: From their direct observations, children absorb a model of marriage.
sentences.cn: 儿童通过直接观察来理解某一种婚姻的模式。

sentences.en: He employs an irreverent humour to salt his observation.
sentences.cn: 他运用玩世不恭的幽默使他的评论更加有趣.

sentences.en: he spent two nights in hospital under observation.
sentences.cn: 他在医院里被观察了两夜。

sentences.en: He spent two nights under close observation in hospital.
sentences.cn: 他在医院接受了两个晚上的严密观察。

sentences.en: His orders were to keep the men under observation.
sentences.cn: 他下的命令是监视这些人。

sentences.en: His powers of observation were uncanny.
sentences.cn: 他的观察能力非常惊人.

sentences.en: In hospital she'll be under observation all the time.
sentences.cn: 医院会对她24小时密切观察。

sentences.en: Many agencies gather information through direct observation.
sentences.cn: 许多机关通过直接的观测收集信息.

sentences.en: Most information was collected by direct observation of the animals' behaviour.
sentences.cn: 大部分信息都是通过直接观察动物的行为收集到的。

sentences.en: Paz makes some observations about the role of the critic.
sentences.cn: 帕斯论述了评论家的作用。

sentences.en: She has good powers of observation.
sentences.cn: 她的观察力很敏锐。

sentences.en: Some interesting observations emerged from this research.
sentences.cn: 这项研究得出了一些有趣的结果。

sentences.en: The astronomers were taking an observation of Jupiter.
sentences.cn: 天文学家们正在观测木星.

sentences.en: The last observation of yours has hit the nail on the head.
sentences.cn: 你最后的意见真是一针见血.

sentences.en: The new breed is under observation.
sentences.cn: 新品种正在观察中.

sentences.en: The play is a rueful, wry observation about the way we are all subject to the ravages of time.
sentences.cn: 该剧凄然而讽刺地描述了我们大家是如何被岁月所摧残的。

sentences.en: There is some swelling and he is being detained for observation.
sentences.cn: 他身上有些浮肿，被留院观察。

sentences.en: When experiments are to be made, one cannot rely too much upon the human senses to make accurate observation.
sentences.cn: 在做实验时, 不能过分依靠人类的感觉去做精确的观察.
